SEARCH
Package gw.api.iso

Class ISOTranslate

java.lang.Object
gw.api.iso.ISOTranslate
public class ISOTranslate extends Object
Utility class for translating ClaimCenter items, such as dates and typecodes, into a form acceptable in an ISO ClaimSearch request

  • Method Details

    • instance

      public static ISOTranslate instance()
      The singleton ISOTranslate instance

      This method only returns a valid ISOTranslate object if the ISO messaging destination is enabled. If not it will return null. Enabling the ISO messaging destination causes the server to read and validate the ISO configuration, including the translations, at start up

      Returns:
      the instance

    • translateTypeCode

      public String translateTypeCode(TypeKey typeKey) throws com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException
      Translate the given ClaimCenter type key into an ISO code.
      Parameters:
      typeKey - ClaimCenter type key, or null
      Returns:
      the corresponding ISO code, or null if the type key was null
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException - If the type key maps to multiple ISO codes

    • optionallyTranslateTypeCode

      public String optionallyTranslateTypeCode(TypeKey typeKey) throws com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException
      Check to see if there is a type list mapping for the given type key's type list. If there is, translate the given ClaimCenter type key into an ISO code. Otherwise, assume the ClaimCenter type key code is already an ISO code and use it directly
      Parameters:
      typeKey - ClaimCenter type key, or null
      Returns:
      the corresponding ISO code, or null if the type key was null
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException - If the type key maps to multiple ISO codes

    • canTranslateTypeCode

      public boolean canTranslateTypeCode(TypeKey typeKey) throws com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException
      Check to see if the typeKey can be translated into ISO code
      Parameters:
      typeKey - ClaimCenter type key
      Returns:
      true if the typeKey can be translated, false if not
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException - if the type key cannot be translated

    • getCoverageCodes

      public ISOCoverageCodes getCoverageCodes(PolicyType policyType, LOBCode lobCode, CoverageType coverageType, CoverageSubtype coverageSubtype, LossCause lossCause) throws com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException
      Translate ClaimCenter policyType/coverageType/coverageSubType to ISO Policy/Coverage/LossType codes. Usually the ISOCoverageCodeMap.csv mapping file can translate ClaimCenter codes to ISO codes directly. But in some case the LOBCode is needed to convert the CC policy type into an ISO policy types (ISO policy types can be more specific than those in CC). Also, in some cases the coverage subtype only maps to a generic ISO loss type - this appears in the mapping file as, for example, LossCause/OTPR. In this case the loss cause of the claim is looked up in the normal type code map to try and get a more specific loss type. If that lookup succeeds it is used as the loss type. If it fails the generic loss type (e.g. OTPR) is used.
      Parameters:
      policyType - policyType to be translated
      lobCode - the LOB code of the claim. For
      coverageType - coverageType to be translated
      coverageSubtype - coverageSubtype to be translated
      lossCause - loss party type of the exposure
      Returns:
      ISOCoverageCodes object containing the translated ISO policyType, coverage type and loss type
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException - if the configuration is invalid, for example if the loss cause lookup fails because the type code mapper contains invalid entries

    • getTypeCodeMapper

      public TypecodeMapper getTypeCodeMapper()
      The type code mapper object used to map ClaimCenter typecodes to ISO codes
      Returns:
      the type code mapper object
